title: Webhooks
description: You'll now be able to create webhooks and work with third-party marketing tools from within Contentrain.

title: Assests manager
description: Our new Asset Manager provides a centralized hub for all your media, making it faster and more efficient to find exactly what you need, when you need it.

title: User workflows
description: This feature ensures a smoother, more coherent journey from concept to completion, enhancing collaboration among team members and reducing the time spent on content administration.

title: New content schema tool
description: With a great new content schema creation tool, you'll be able to create your content models easier than ever.
